name: Black Tie Affair
description:
Aroma: Top notes of Kaffir lime, lemon and ozonic; middle notes of basil, black pepper and cucumber; base notes of Vetiver and spice.   More of a masculine fragrance but can be unisex.

Ingredients: Saponified Olive, Coconut, Palm & Canola Oils and Cocoa & Shea Butters.  Activated Charcoal, Silk Fibers and Fragrance Oil.

-

Price is for one (1) bar.

Net weight of each bar is 4.5oz

name: Blue Sugar
description:
Aroma: Base note of Black Patchouli blends perfectly with Orange Peel, Sparkling Mandarin, Coriander Leaves, Star Anise and Venezuela Tonka. 

Ingredients: Saponified Olive, Coconut, Palm & Canola Oils and Cocoa & Shea Butters.  Colorant, Silk Fibers and Fragrance Oil.

-

name: Candy Cane

name: Egyptian Dragon
description:
Aroma: An aromatic melange of warm amber, sweet frankincense and myrrh complimented with a light touch of patchouli. A vanilla note harmonizes this fragrant accord with a long lasting drydown of a dark animalistic musk.  More of a masculine fragrance but can be unisex.

Ingredients: Saponified Olive, Coconut, Palm & Canola Oils and Cocoa & Shea Butters.  Activated Charcoal, Colorant, Silk Fibers and Fragrance Oil.

-

name: Frozen Margarita
description:

name: Soap/Wooden Dish Combo Set
description:
One Bar of Soap (your choice)
One Wooden Soap Dish

Please indicate which soap you would like upon check out.

name: Bath Bomb
description:
Price is for one (1) Bath Bomb.
Size 7-9oz

Ingredients: Sodium Bicarbonate, Citric Acid, Sea & Epsom Salts, Cocoa Butter, Grapeseed Oil, Fragrance and or Essential Oils.

Caution: Please use caution when entering/exiting bath tub as the Cocoa Butter will create a slippery surface.

name: Whipped Cocoa Butter
description:
Ingredients: Cocoa Butter, Coconut Oil & Kaolin Clay. Naturally scented.

-

4oz (filled by volume)

How to use: Apply/massage butter into areas that need a little extra TLC.  As with most butters a little goes a long way. For best results apply on clean, slightly damp skin after shower or bath.

name: Body Lotion
description:
Ingredients: Distilled Water, Sweet Almond Oil, Emulsifying Wax, Cocoa Butter, Stearic Acid, Vitamin E Oil, Preservative and Fragrance or Essential Oil

-

8oz (filled by volume)

This lotion is light, absorbs quickly, super emollient and soothing leaving your skin smooth and silky without feeling greasy.

Handmade in small batches from scratch not from a pre-made lotion base.

name: Whipped Shea Butter
description:
Ingredients: Shea Butter, Coconut, Jojoba, Grapeseed & Castor Oils.  Kaolin Clay & Fragrance or Essential Oils.

-

Filled by Volume


Directions: Take a dime sized amount and massage into your skin.  As with most butters a little goes a long way. This shea butter will begin to melt upon skin contact. For best results apply to clean, damp skin after a shower or bath.

Product can be used for both skin and hair.

name: Hair Conditioner
description:
Ingredients: Distilled Water, Silk Amino Acids, Panthenol, Meadowfoam Oil, Vegetable Glycerin, Cetyl Esters, BTMF-50 Emulsifier, Vitamin E Oil, Preservative and Grapefruit Essential Oil.

-

Price is for one (1) bottle

8oz (filled by volume)

Directions: Apply to damp hair, cover and let sit for 10-15 minutes, rinse out hair completely with cool water and style as usual.  Works well with all hair types.

Handmade in small batches from scratch, not a pre-made hair conditioner base.

name: Natural Shampoo Bar
description:
Aroma: Scented with Grapefruit & Peppermint Essential Oil

Ingredients:  Saponified Coconut, Olive, Castor & Avocado oils.  Shea & Mango Butter, Meadowfoam & Palm Oils.  Silk Amino Acid, Panthenol &Essential Oils.

-

Net Weight 4.5oz

name: Wooden Soap Dish
description:
Pine Wooden Soap Dish - a slotted dish with beveled edges allows your handcrafted soap to dry between uses, which creates a longer lasting bar.

*Soap in picture not included*
